attributes.action: Consider the votes of young people as having more weight in EU referendum.
attributes.background: Young people will have to deal with the consequences of leaving the EU much more than the old, in terms of years of life with this change. Young people had a majority for remain whereas the old voted to leave. Overall, the young are going to have to live with something they didn't want for longer.

rejection.details: It's not clear how this could be done. Voting in the UK is anonymous. It is not therefore possible to work out which votes were cast by young people.
